sn44.5:4.1: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were staying near Benares, in the deer park at Isipatana. …
sn44.5:4.3: “What’s the cause, reverend, what’s the reason why this has not been declared by the Buddha?”
sn44.5:4.4: “Reverend, if you’re not rid of greed, desire, fondness, thirst, passion, and craving for form …
sn44.5:4.9: consciousness, you think ‘a Realized One exists after death’ …
sn44.5:4.10: ‘a Realized One neither exists nor doesn’t exist after death.’
sn44.5:4.11: If you are rid of greed for form …
sn44.5:4.15: consciousness, you don’t think ‘a Realized One exists after death’ …
sn44.5:4.16: ‘a Realized One neither exists nor doesn’t exist after death.’
sn44.5:4.17: This is the cause, this is the reason why this has not been declared by the Buddha.”
